body_html:
Yes, the logs for non-chief worker were posted above. I was wondering if you meant chief worker. I posted the logs for the chief worker below:

junshi15$ python nonchief_hang_v3.py --time_major  --out_dir=/tmp/rnn/work0 --ps_hosts=localhost:2222  --worker_hosts=localhost:1111,localhost:3333 --task_index=0 --job_name=worker
2018-08-06 09:31:55.765383: I tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:140] Your CPU supports instructions that this TensorFlow binary was not compiled to use: AVX2 FMA
2018-08-06 09:31:55.766691: I tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_channel.cc:215] Initialize GrpcChannelCache for job ps -> {0 -> localhost:2222}
2018-08-06 09:31:55.766719: I tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_channel.cc:215] Initialize GrpcChannelCache for job worker -> {0 -> localhost:1111, 1 -> localhost:3333}
2018-08-06 09:31:55.767065: I tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_server_lib.cc:332] Started server with target: grpc://localhost:1111
INFO:tensorflow:Create CheckpointSaverHook.
INFO:tensorflow:Graph was finalized.
2018-08-06 09:31:57.797718: I tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/master_session.cc:1136] Start master session 6e427cebcbefcb54 with config:
INFO:tensorflow:Running local_init_op.

body:
Yes, the logs for non-chief worker were posted above. I was wondering if you meant chief worker. I posted the logs for the chief worker below:
```
junshi15$ python nonchief_hang_v3.py --time_major  --out_dir=/tmp/rnn/work0 --ps_hosts=localhost:2222  --worker_hosts=localhost:1111,localhost:3333 --task_index=0 --job_name=worker
2018-08-06 09:31:55.765383: I tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:140] Your CPU supports instructions that this TensorFlow binary was not compiled to use: AVX2 FMA
2018-08-06 09:31:55.766691: I tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_channel.cc:215] Initialize GrpcChannelCache for job ps -> {0 -> localhost:2222}
2018-08-06 09:31:55.766719: I tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_channel.cc:215] Initialize GrpcChannelCache for job worker -> {0 -> localhost:1111, 1 -> localhost:3333}
2018-08-06 09:31:55.767065: I tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_server_lib.cc:332] Started server with target: grpc://localhost:1111
INFO:tensorflow:Create CheckpointSaverHook.
INFO:tensorflow:Graph was finalized.
```
